query:
ALTER TABLE archvizRenders 
ADD COLUMN approvalStatus ENUM('pending', 'in_review', 'approved', 'rejected') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL AFTER status,
ADD COLUMN approvedById INT AFTER approvalStatus,
ADD COLUMN approvedAt TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER approvedById,
ADD COLUMN rejectionReason TEXT AFTER approvedAt
